passives.name: Spellcasting
passives.description:
The apprentice is a 1st-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). The apprentice has following spells prepared:

Cantrips (at will): light , sacred flame , thaumaturgy

1st level (3 slots): cure wounds , sanctuary

actions.name: Dagger
actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack:   +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target.  Hit:  5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

bonusActions.name: Desperate Mending (3/Day)
bonusActions.description: The apprentice can use a bonus action to attempt to mend an ally's wounds. The apprentice touches a creature within 5 feet and rolls a d10. On a roll of 1 or 2, the apprentice deals 1d10 damage to the creature. On a roll of 3 through 5, the apprentice stabilizes the creature and it regains 1 hit point. On a roll of 6 or higher, the creature regains hit points equal to the number rolled. If this reduces the creature to 0 hit points, the apprentice must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of all creatures for 1 minute . On a successful save, the apprentice is not frightened but is stunned until the end of its next turn.

bonusActions.name: Nimble Training (4/Day)
bonusActions.description: The skirmisher can disengage as a bonus action, and it gets 5 extra feet of movement speed while disengaging.
